@graph.name: Cold Soba Noodle Salad Recipe with Sesame Lime Ginger Dressing
@graph.description: Cold Soba Noodle Salad Recipe. Noodle Salad Bowl with Peppers, Carrots, Zucchini, Green Onion and Sesame Lime Ginger Dressing. Refreshing Summer Salad. Vegan Nutfree. Gluten-free Option, Soy-free Option
recipeIngredient: Juice of half a lime ((full lime if the lime is small or less juicy))
1 tsp sesame oil (, plus more for coating noodles)
1.5 tbsp soy sauce ((use tamari for gluten-free, coconut aminos for soyfree))
2 tsp asian chile sauce (sambal oelek) (or sriracha or other hot sauce to taste)
7 to 8 oz Soba noodles (, use pure buckwheat soba or rice noodles for gluten-free)
6 or 7  green onions (.green parts chopped, divided)
Sesame seeds (, green onion, cilantro/mint (optional), crushed roasted peanuts/cashews(optional) for garnish)
optional additions: edamame (, baked tofu, other crunchy veggies etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the dressing ingredients in a bowl. Taste and adjust sweet, heat, tang(lime). Chill for 15 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the dressing ingredients in a bowl. Taste and adjust sweet, heat, tang(lime). Chill for 15 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles according to instruction on the package. (Simmer in boiling water for 4 to 5 mins for the wheat + buckwheat soba). Drain and rinse with cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the noodles according to instruction on the package. (Simmer in boiling water for 4 to 5 mins for the wheat + buckwheat soba). Drain and rinse with cold water.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the noodles to a bowl and add a tsp of oil or sesame oil and toss to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the noodles to a bowl and add a tsp of oil or sesame oil and toss to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the veggies and half of the green onions to the bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the veggies and half of the green onions to the bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dressing to the bowl and toss well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dressing to the bowl and toss well.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust. Add salt or soy sauce for saltier, a bit more sweetener if needed, lime or vinegar for tang.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust. Add salt or soy sauce for saltier, a bit more sweetener if needed, lime or vinegar for tang.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with green onions, crushed nuts(optional) and sesame seeds (optional). Chill and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with green onions, crushed nuts(optional) and sesame seeds (optional). Chill and serve.
